name: B-Rex by Emanuele Bonin (Commodore 64)
description:
B-Rex

A one button  game  for  Retro  T-Rex Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/retrotrex)

Developed by Retro Programmers Inside Aka GDM (https://www.facebook.com/groups/RetroProgrammersInside)

Jump: Fire on Joystick plugged in port 2

The goal of the game is to accumulate points by Jumping over the various obstacles. If you don't jump over an obstacle the "chi" power will decrease. You can increase the "chi" power grapping the chi symbols that appers at the top of the screeen. The game level up based on  points.

Enjoy!
